contentfulProduct.title: Organic Turkish Spa Bath Towels (Set of 2)
contentfulProduct.subtitle: Traditional Retail Price $92

content.value: Make everyday a spa day with our top-of-the-line Turkish towel set, crafted of 100% organic Turkish cotton. Supremely soft and plush, you'll be wondering how you used anything else. Comes in a set of two.
Made from 100% organic premium, long staple Turkish cotton
Towel set includes two 27" x 54" luxury quality towels
700 grams per square meter
Pairs perfectly with our Organic Luxe Turkish Cotton Bath Robe
Free of harmful chemicals and toxins
Made with care in Turkey

Machine wash cool with like colors using mild laundry detergent. Avoid washing with items that have zippers, Velcro, hooks, or other sharp objects that could snag or pull the loops. In the event of a snagged loop, cut it with scissors. Avoid contact with skin care products to prevent discoloration. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low or hang dry. Remove promptly.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Made from 100% organic premium, long staple Turkish cotton
  • Towel set includes two 27" x 54" luxury quality towels
  • 700 grams per square meter
  • Pairs perfectly with our Organic Luxe Turkish Cotton Bath Robe
  • Free of harmful chemicals and toxins
  • Made with care in Turkey
